_header: Saint Julian the confessor was I-bore at Rome
Subjects: saints’ lives; Julian the confessor, saint
_description: Life of St. Julian the Confessor in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynt Iulian þe confessour ibore was at romeMony men
                    þoruȝ is prechynge to cristendom come…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Anoþer seynt Iulian þare is þat men bidteth to
                    uasteAfter good In in strange stude wen hii beþ þer of
                    agaste

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint Iulyan þe comfessour i bore was at romemony mon to
                    cristindom þorw his preching come…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…at þe ende of ieneuer þis comfessour so deidegod
                    for þe loue of hym vs alle þedir to de

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Iulian þe confessor i bore was at RoomeMony cuntreis to
                    cristendom þoruȝ his prechinge come…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou God for þe loue of seint Iulian lete vs here so
                    wisseÞat we whonne we henne wende come to heuene bliss.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Iulian þe confessour was i bore at romeMuche folk
                    þoruȝ is prechingue cristine heo bi come…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…An oþur Seint Iulian þare is þat men biddeth
                    welfasteAfter guod Iu in onecouth stude ȝwane heo beoth sore
                    agaste
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 155-6.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Iulian þe confessour ybore was at romeMani man to
                    cristendom þorw his prechyng come…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Atte endyng of Ieneuer þis confessour so hendeNow god
                    for þe loue of him vs all þider sende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Iulian þe confessor bore was at romeMany men to
                    cristindom þour his preching come…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…At þe ending of geneuer þis confessour so hendeNow
                    god for þe loue of him vs alle þidir sendeAnoþer seint
                    Iulian þer is þat men beden fasteAfter good herberwe in strong
                    stede whan þei be þer of a gaste

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Iulian þe confessour I bore was at romeMony men to
                    cristendom þoru his prechinge come…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Atte endynge of geniuer þis confessour so hendeNou god
                    for þe loue of him us alle þuder bringe

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Hilari þo confessour ybore was at RomeMony men to
                    cristendom þorw his preching come…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Atte endyng of Ianuwer þis confessour goed and hendeNow
                    god ffor þe loue of him vs alle þider sende

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Iulian þe confessor ibore was at romeManiman þorow his preching to cristendom come…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …Anof seyn Iulian þer is þat men biddeþ to vasteAfter god In in strange stede whan hi beþ þer of a gaste
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum ix” added to right margin by later hand (f. 14).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Iulian þe confessoure ibore was at romeMonie to cristendom þorw  is preching come…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …At þe ende of Ianiuer þis confessour so hendeGod for þe loue of him vs alle to heuene wende

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Iulian þe confessur ybore was at RomeMany man þorȝ is prechinge to cristindom come…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …In godis seruyse atte laste his lif he broȝte to hendeNou vor þe loue of hym god ous alle þidir sende

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEint Iulian þe confessour Ibore was at romeMonymen to cristendom þoru is prechinge come…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Atte ending of geniuer þis confessour so hendeNou god for þe loue of him us alle þuder sende
BLEge2891.Note: Last line initially omitted, added by scribe to right margin with an arrow pointing to space after penultimate line.
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto Iuliane confessore (rubric in margin, f. 4)

BLHar2250.First Lines:
Saynt Iulian þe confessor borne was in RomeMony cuntree to
                    cristendome þurgh his prechyng come…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…An oþer saynt Iulian þer is þat men prayen to
                    fastQuen men ben gon in strong stydde & of herbare ben
                    aghast

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Iulyan þe confessor born was at RomeMony cuntry to
                    cristendome þurȝ his prechinge come…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Anoþer saynt Iulyan þer is þat men to prayen
                    fastWhen men ben in straunge stid & of herbere ben agast

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Iulian þe Confessour ybore was at RomeMany men To
                    cristendome þorgh his preching come…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…At þe endinge of Ianivere þis confessour so
                    hendeGod for þe loue of hym vs alle þidere sende Amen
